newsitem.title: USA: SAVILLE SEEKS VOTE FOR STOCK SPLIT.
newsitem.headline: SAVILLE SEEKS VOTE FOR STOCK SPLIT.

text.p: Saville Systems Plc said Wednesday planned an extraordinary stockholders meeting to vote on amending the Saville charter to allow for a stock split.
The meeting, authorized by the company's board, is expected to take place in early October.

The company said that under Irish law, the board of directors of a company does not generally have the authority to declare a bonus issue to shareholders, which is the equivalent of a stock dividend in the United States.
An amendment to its articles of incorporation would give the board of directors such authority, if approved by the company's shareholders, Saville said.
